blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: There is literally no universe in which Dan would call Phil something on camera if he thought that it meant “baby.” And there’s...
question: There is literally no universe in which Dan would call Phil something on camera if he thought that it meant “baby.” And there’s especially no universe where Phil would just leave it in the video, were it to happen accidentally. There’s nothing at all to be excited about here, unless you find platonic nicknames exciting.
answer: We all know that the Phandom finds everything exciting. Especially platonic stuff that they can bend and twist into maybe, possibly, something romantic. If you squint.

reblog.comment: We all know that the Phandom finds everything exciting. Especially platonic stuff that they can bend and twist into maybe, possibly, something romantic. If you squint.

trail.content_raw: We all know that the Phandom finds everything exciting. Especially platonic stuff that they can bend and twist into maybe, possibly, something romantic. If you squint.
trail.content: We all know that the Phandom finds everything exciting. Especially platonic stuff that they can bend and twist into maybe, possibly, something romantic. If you squint.

tags: it'd be swell of them to upload during the week i'm between jobs
summary: I sent an ask awhile back and you said you couldn’t get properly hyped for pinof until after spooky week so PINOF 10 HYPE 🙌
question: I sent an ask awhile back and you said you couldn’t get properly hyped for pinof until after spooky week so PINOF 10 HYPE 🙌
answer:
this one? (x) well m8s here we are, spooky week has ended, the pumpkins are decaying, the skulls have tinsel round them (x) and it’s time to get out the cat whiskers

i think i’m more hyped for pinof 10 than i was for 9 last year? like let’s just take a sec. last year we thought pinof 9 and the bloops were the absolute best thing to happen to us (vid-wise, although dnp and dogs might’ve come close) but in terms of them being open & authentic, we had: dan with curls, ‘philly’, ‘watch me dad’, bad innuendos, phil holding dan’s face, arm wrestling, ‘anal’, dan’s soft “nonononono” during the crab walk, the slime, their seflies, dan drawing a tattoo of himself on phil’s arm, the ribena flip (and dan’s edit), “you spork” 

but already this year we’ve got phil embracing the quiff, we’ve lost a lot of dan majorly overreacting to phil’s innuendos, we had dan sticking his head between phil’s thighs, we had thirty three minutes and fourteen seconds of honesty and realness, we’ve had so much kink/sex talk that even the most demon of phannies are sick of it, and an entire six month tour of them traveling and trying to be and show their most authentic selves

ik i’ve said it a lot this year so far but they’re wildly unpredictable this year, throw assumptions and guesses out the window. but i cannot wait for pinof 10

summary: literally everyone in my family calls my brother 'bub' and 'bubba', IT LITERALLY MEANS BROTHER
question: literally everyone in my family calls my brother 'bub' and 'bubba', IT LITERALLY MEANS BROTHER
answer:
I understand that language is weird and words can mean different things in different places but literally where in the world does “bub” mean “baby” or “actual love of my life”.


Like, how is this a thing people are getting excited about.

reblog.comment:
